full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, TSE RIGS NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN DBANG GI SRAS LNGA PA, BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO RTZIL RIGS PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS AA CHI THU TAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA GNYIS KA'ANG, NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHAL DU, ^KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE ' CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YAS PAntI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BU, NYON MONGS KYI BRANG DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS , SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PA CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO'I SROGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
